document_data.mainbody: '''Far Traveler''' was a constellation in the sky above [[Sildëyuir]]. Its name originated from a lovelorn character in [[Sildëyuir]]an mythology: an elder elf whose love for the [[Bright Star]] was parted by events for centuries, but in the end they found the way back to each other.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Kiril Duskmourn]] used the pet name 'Far Traveler' for his love, [[Nangulis]], in honor of the constellation.{{cite book/Stardeep|290|28}}
